jobTitle: Sr. Designer, Cut & Sew Knits - Walmart Division
industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
NYC Alliance Company LLC is seeking a talented and experienced Sr. Designer specializing in Cut & Sew Knits for our Walmart Division. As a Sr. Designer, you will be responsible for creating and developing innovative and commercially viable designs for our Cut & Sew Knits category. Working closely with cross-functional teams, you will play a key role in driving the product development process and ensuring the successful execution of designs that meet the brand's aesthetic and market demands.

NYC Alliance Company LLC is a leading multi-channel apparel company committed to delivering high-quality fashion products to our customers. With a focus on creating a responsive supply chain, we strive to stay ahead of the latest industry trends and deliver exceptional value to our partners.

Responsibilities:

  • Conceptualize, design, and develop a range of Cut & Sew Knits products in line with brand aesthetic and market trends
  • Create detailed technical sketches, specifications, and design presentations for production
  • Collaborate closely with the product development team to ensure designs are translated into commercially viable products
  • Identify and evaluate new fabrications, trims, and techniques to enhance product quality and innovation
  • Stay up-to-date with current fashion trends, market research, and consumer preferences in Cut & Sew Knits
  • Ensure all designs meet quality and industry standards, as well as Walmart's specific requirements
  • Provide guidance and direction to design team members
  • Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment


Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Fashion Design or related field
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in design, with a focus on Cut & Sew Knits
  • Strong portfolio showcasing creativity and design skills
  • Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite, Illustrator, PLM
  • Strong knowledge of garment construction, fabrics, and trims
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team
  • Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  • Knowledge of current fashion trends and market dynamics in the Cut & Sew Knits segment
  • Familiarity with Walmart's product development processes and requirements is a plus


Benefits

  • Competitive compensation packages
  • Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA
  • Retirement Savings Plan Match
  • Summer Fridays
  • Discounts and More!
  • Annual Salary $120,000
  • The offered salary for this position will vary based on role requirements determined by NYC Alliance, skill set and years of experience
